story.text: There are four steps to making a home here once you have your own site. In other systems this would be like filling out your profile page. Do these steps in any order.
Tip: Drag paragraphs or the marker to mark progress.
Choose a flag that you like. The flags are color gradients that we use in lots of places. We picked gradients, you pick colors. See [[About Flagmatic Plugin]]

Tell us your name. Return to the [[Welcome Visitors]] page and write your full and friendly name in the first gray field. Make it a link if you want to tell us more, like your various internet handles. Write these on the new page.

Tell us what you are doing. You might just be Exploring Wiki. Say that. Make it a link. Go to that page and write about your explorations. You can change all this later, or simply create another wiki.
Share your wiki with those you are collaborating with, see [[Sharing Your Wiki]].

item.text: There are four steps to making a home here. In other systems this would be like filling out your profile page. Do each sooner rather than later.
Choose a flag that you like. The flags are color gradients that we use lots of places. We picked gradients, you pick colors. See [[About Flagmatic Plugin]]
Claim the site. See where it says, Sign in with your Email. Click that button. Login mechanisms vary from site to site so follow the instructions that pop up.

Tell us your name. Return to the [[Welcome Visitors]] page and write your full and friendly name in the first gray field. Make it a link if you want to tell us more, like your various internet handles. Write these on the page titled by your full name.

Tell us your name. Return to the [[Welcome Visitors]] page and write your full and friendly name in the first gray field. Make it a link if you want to tell us more, like your various internet handles. Write these on the page titled by your name.

Tell us your name. Return to the [[Welcome Visitors]] page and write your full and friendly name in the first gray field. Make it a link if you want to tell us more, like your various internet handles. Write these on the new page.
Tell us what you are doing. You might just be Exploring Wiki. Say that. Make it a link. Go to that page and write about your explorations.
Tell us what you are doing. You might just be Exploring Wiki. Say that. Make it a link. Go to that page and write about your explorations. You can change all this later.

Claim the site. See where it says, Sign in with your Email? Click that button. Login mechanisms vary from site to site so follow the instructions that pop up.
Choose a flag that you like. The flags are color gradients that we use in lots of places. We picked gradients, you pick colors. See [[About Flagmatic Plugin]]

Tell us your name. Return to the [[Welcome Visitors]] page and write your full and friendly name in the first gray field. Make it a link if you want to tell us more, like your various internet handles or why you are here. Write these on the new page.

Tell us your name. Return to the [[Welcome Visitors]] page and write your full and friendly name in the first gray field. Make it a link if you want to tell us more, like your various internet handles. Write these on the new page.

Claim the site by being the first to login. See where it says, Sign in with your Email, or maybe just a lock idon? Click that button. Login mechanisms vary from site to site so follow the instructions that pop up.

Claim the site by being the first to login. See where in the footer it says, Sign in with your Email, or maybe just a lock icon? Click that button. Login mechanisms vary from site to site so follow the instructions that pop up.
Share your wiki with those you are collaborating with, see [[Sharing Your Wiki]].

Tell us what you are doing. You might just be Exploring Wiki. Say that. Make it a link. Go to that page and write about your explorations. You can change all this later, or simply create another wiki.
